about_the_game:
Dive into Feline Realms: The Ancients' Legacy, a quirky RPG inspired by the golden era of role-playing games.

The story follows an ancient feline race that once traveled between worlds through portals. While they live peacefully on Felix IV, an invading force from a parallel world awakens the gate leading to Earth. Our heroes are called upon, unwillingly, to defend Earth against this new threat—unaware of their ancient heritage.

Rediscover your heritage as the Seshat Ankh, unlock your Guardian powers... or forge your own path—I'm not judging. The fate of Earth lies in your hands.

Oh, and good luck with the humans... To most of them, you're just a strange cat. To others, you're royalty. The modern world presents dangers that are unique to being a cat, as you'll soon discover.

The combat relies on old-school RPG mechanics, and features three different difficulty levels, making it accessible to both young, impatient heroes and hardcore veterans who like to use their full toolkit to achieve victory.

The game is non-linear, meaning you can accomplish goals in any order you choose. You can try to beat some big bosses right away if you dare, but I recommend finding some gear first, as well as acquiring some levels. The loot system is inspired by MMORPGs, where loot is gained through questing, defeating bosses, clearing dungeons, and of course, opening chests and visiting NPC vendors.

Dive into Feline Realms: The Ancients' Legacy, a quirky RPG inspired by the golden era of role-playing games.

The story follows an ancient feline race that once traveled between worlds through portals. While they live peacefully on Felix IV, an invading force from a parallel world awakens the gate leading to Earth. Oh, and good luck with the humans... To most of them, you're just a strange cat. To others, you're royalty. The modern world presents dangers that are unique to being a cat, as you'll soon discover.

The combat relies on old-school RPG mechanics, and features three different difficulty levels, making it accessible to both young, impatient heroes and hardcore veterans who like to use their full toolkit to achieve victory.

The game is non-linear, meaning you can accomplish goals in any order you choose. You can try to beat some big bosses right away if you dare, but I recommend finding some gear first, as well as acquiring some levels. The loot system is inspired by MMORPGs, where loot is gained through questing, defeating bosses, clearing dungeons, and of course, opening chests and visiting NPC vendors.
name: Feline Realms  - The Ancients' Legacy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Feline Realms: The Ancients' Legacy is a turn-based RPG where ancient feline heroes rediscover their forgotten heritage to defend Earth from an invading force. Unlock your Guardian powers, and navigate a modern world filled with danger. Can you reclaim your legacy and save Earth?
